entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider adding option in csproj for software and fixed point number types #87793
  • [JIT] Optimise `Vector128.AndNot(v1, v2) == Vector128<T>.Zero` to `Sse41.TestC(v1, v2)` #87792
    Future
  • Please backport fix for #84994 (via PR #85001) to .NET 7 #87791
  • System.Data.OleDb.Tests timeout in net48 x86 Release leg #87783
  • Smoke tests failing in CentOSStream8_Mono_Offline_MsftSdk_x64 source-build leg #87772
  • .net8 preview4 AOT windows service process, log component always writes to ETW #87769
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Refactor GlobalizationNative_IndexOfNative function #87767
  • Enable NativeAOT cross-platform build for iOS-like platforms #87764
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Mirrow (ReadOnly)Span<char> MemoryExtensions methods for (ReadOnly)Memory<char> #87763
  • SYSLIB1045 The code fix removes all curly braces on single line if statements in the file #87762
  • NullReferenceException when ManualResetEventSlim.Set #87761
  • Test failure baseservices/compilerservices/UnsafeAccessors/UnsafeAccessorsTests/UnsafeAccessorsTests.sh #87760
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to System.Diagnostics.Metrics's Meter and Instruments #87758
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `ReadOnlySpan<char>` overloads for `StringNormalizationExtensions` #87757
    Future
  • Test failure DataContractJsonSerializerTests.DCJS_BoolAsRoot #87755
  • tiering makes regex-redux significantly slower #87753
    8.0.0

Closed

  • FrameworkList.xml generated in libraries build for live ref pack does not include source generators #87582
    8.0.0
  • Determine behavior for GeneratedComClass on a type with no GeneratedComInterface interfaces #84032
    8.0.0
  • Out Of Memory From Pinned byte[] used in SslStream #76029
    8.0.0
  • MAUI Blazor App fails on load for adhoc release #85722
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient returns "System.IO.IOException: The response ended prematurely" when run in a container #86434
  • Ref-packs built on Windows platform do not include all Intellisense files #87585
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice #87244
    8.0.0
  • Optimize the iteration over all registers in various places in LSRA #87337
    8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] SIGSEGV error caused by NullReferenceException handling on iOS device #87458
    8.0.0
  • Framework Not Detecting On Linux When Executing "dotnet" Command #87704
  • Field defined with profiling API contains out of thin air values #87213
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Physical promotion can create some writebacks too late #87611
    8.0.0
  • Json generator should hoist property values in serialization fast-path when ignore condition on write is set #80703
    8.0.0
  • How to perform ntlm authentication when using alpine as base image? #87568
    Future
  • Guarded devirtualization based on whole program view #86235
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Stop allocating address exposed locals if they are unreferenced #87790
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix outerloop CI error #87789
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2204780 #87788
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update WCF package versions #87787
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for DOTNET_SYSTEM_NET_HOSTALIASES #87786
    area-System.Net
  • Setup support for managed runtime events #87785
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update version of MSDia and default to using shipped versions #87782
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add hosting test to validate behavior of runtime property set twice #87781
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add missing Free methods for our Com interface marshallers. #87777
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Update branding to 7.0.9 #87776
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.20 #87775
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Allow unnecessary [In, Out] attributes on blittable arrays and report them as unnecessary #87774
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Enable reading process environment variables in EventPipe #87771
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging][mono][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87770
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure that parsed JsonElement values are never marked as disposable. #87766
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Added Vector128 intrinsics that depend on Vector64 for arm64 #87765
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add DebuggerDisplay to Logger and Logger<T> #87754
    area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.0

Merged

  • fix mono HelloWorld sample #87778
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update generators.targets #87784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose AVX512 Compare and BlendVariable APIs #87404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [arm64]Use pairwise store in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #87737
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Unconditionally suppress IL2026 for StartupHookProvider.CallStartupHook #87779
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Use analyzers from targeting pack for NetCoreAppCurrent #87726
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, needs-area-label
  • [PERF] Fix crossgen zip missing error #87662
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fixed System.Tests.DateTimeTests.TryFormat_MatchesToString test #87693
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Cache significant segments computations for layouts in physical promotion #87745
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix LocalUses::FindAccess #87732
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable GDV with multiple guesses for NativeAOT #87380
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Revert "[mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 " #87780
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • add zero byte read to SslStream #87563
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Upgrade iOS performance queue to OSX 13 #86574
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Make sure intellisense files are copied to the ref pack output for the current TargetOS #87603
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add some limits in physical promotion #87729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ParseQuoteString handling of non-ASCII chars #87756
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Use local variable to evaluate property value only once in JsonSourceGenerator #87725
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • add review comment to sb files #87003
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add helix retries for debugger tests #87565
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Add more load PackedSimd methods #87403
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Insert writebacks in proper post-order location #87612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Add conditional substitution for IsDynamicCodeSupported when targeting ios-like platforms #86971
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios
  • CVE-2023-24936: Check type is allowed when deserializing instance types that implements INullable #87702
    area-System.Data
  • [wasm][debugger] Showing "Frame not in module" after vscode-js-debug bump on VS #87154
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] make cwraps more conditional #87274
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Add support for stripping during AOT compilation on iOS #87728
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Change JitGuardedDevirtualizationChainStatements to 1 #87437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GDV: don't emit fallback call if classes are "exact" #87055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update ExperimentalAttribute.cs #87759
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Claims identity and principal debugging update #87742
    area-System.Security

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] ThreadStatics part 2 #87148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Upgrade to LLVM 16 #87190
    blocked, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add opt-in support for GeneratedComInterface/ComImport RCW interop #87583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Intrinsify Array GetArrayDataReference for SZ arrays #87374
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline TLS field access for linux x64/arm64 #87082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][MT] fix library tests, remove MonoWasmBuildVariant=perftrace #87549
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, 8.0.0
  • Import isinst/castclass Nullable as underlying type #87241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the various Min and Max APIs are accelerated where possible #87641
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Make idSmallCns signed to allow including -1 #87373
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Expose a `Lock` type in preview mode #87672
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [TEST] http metrics sandbox #87697
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Support config binding ext methods in options assembly #87733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Implement collation native functions functions #86895
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [WIP] enable regions for MacOS #87421
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix constant preparing for shuffle stub #87708
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Format/Parse binary from/to BigInteger #85392
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Convert HttpListener to use public NegotiateAuthentication API #86956
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #86504
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • add AllowTlsResume to SslStream options #86047
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Fix muxer handling of symlinks on Windows #87717
    area-Host
  • [browser][MT] Make HTTP and WS clients work #87567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Return Matrix.Identity from static field instead of creating it every time #87723
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Expand interpreter PackedSimd support #87719
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Fix an assertion. #87692
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [browser] Unify boot config schema #86255
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix ID regression in Alpine Linux builds #86804
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add smoke unit runtime tests for Native AOT on iOS platforms #87260
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][mini] Fix conversion from r4/r8 to native u #85964
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • add support for https proxy #87638
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Add back cmake command-line cache on unix #86764
    area-Infrastructure
  • Email addresses in same domain not equal #87721
    area-System.Net, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Options validation source generator #87587
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #87734
    area-Host, 7.0.x
  • [PoC] surface Quic transport errors #87679
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • Additional JsonNode functionality #87381
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (3/n) #87688
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command #87707
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass GC values in LLVM/WASM registers #2312

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Codegen fixes for libraries tests #2311
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial version of a multi-threaded compiler #2297
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use a universal stub for interface dispatch #2304
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stub out finalization and enable some tests #2306
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable more tests and fix more bugs #2308

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • stack dump in VS from ValidateAssembliesTask on input not found #33396
  • NETSDK1139 should suggest enabling the workload resolver when disabled #33395
  • ppc64le crash MSB0001: Internal MSBuild Error: Cannot acquire required number of nodes. #33378

Closed

  • Disclosed vulnerability in dotnet 6.0: GHSA-5crp-9r3c-p9vr (Newtonsoft.Json) #31382

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a unique error message when workloads are disabled but a customer is trying to use workloads #33406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to Svc Pool #33405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #33400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33399
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33398
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #33397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.120 #33390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.315 #33391
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 6.0.412 #33392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.109 #33393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 7.0.306 #33394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add review comment to sb files #32966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2204896 #33303
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Sequester UseArtifactsOutput logic in its own file #33310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add details command #31743
    untriaged
  • Fix Source Link cross-targeting targets #33292
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The LSIF generator should emit warnings if the binlog is skipping projects #68692
  • Outputting hover information consumes a huge amount of the LSIF indexing time #68691
  • The LSIF generator should allow for a per-document timeout #68690
  • Evaluating patterns fails with "Internal error in the C# compiler" #68689
  • Data Tips should work for properties in patterns #68688
  • [API proposal] Collection literals #68687
  • Simply opening .editorconfig file makes significant changes to the file for C# settings #68683
  • Prefer simple using statement setting not respected when "No" #68682

Closed

  • LSIF generator fails to start because it cannot find the .NET SDK - Near term fix #67383
  • Feature 'Navigation bar' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68672
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #68679
  • Expected value of GetEnclosingSymbol for PrimaryConstructorBaseTypeSyntax #68661
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2204488 #68686
  • Reduce allocations for LocalScopeBinder.BuildLocals #68684
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Service cleanup #68681
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Relax ref readonly parameter signature matching #68680
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68685
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2192664 #68422
  • Enable spell checking for Razor #68678
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Omit Slice call when start is 0 and 0 <= end <=length. #68660
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, Next
  • Avoid `Span` creation when indexing into an inline array with a constant. #68642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Updated

  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Add ReportIVTs compiler mode #68665
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add ExternalAccess API for interceptors #68652
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement "extension invocation" section for methods #68629
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, C# 12.0
  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Relax value checks for `ref readonly` parameters #68656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Primary Constructors: Implement double storage warning for field initializers #68662
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Relax parameter-argument modifier matching for ref readonly parameters #68224
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Primary ctors #68477
    Area-Interactive, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #48905
  • Perf regression: https #48904
  • Blazor SSR forms redirect and antiforgery tokens? #48903
  • Blazor Server with Azure AD B2C and Azure SignalR authentication not working #48902
  • ASP.NET Core Logging Integration version 7.0.7 on Azure but running on .NET 6 #48898
  • Writing HTML via BodyWriter is broken when VS.NET "Refresh browser after build" is on. #48897
  • ResourceInvoker no longer used with single authentication Scheme, causing issues with ActionContext #48893

Closed

  • Blazor iOS Safari Navigation.NavigateTo("authentication/logout"); does not work #48878
  • Perf regression: mapaction #48873
  • Resource based localization not working for flags enum #31122
    Backlog
  • cannot route url - AdditionalAssemblies in app.razor - blazor web app #48875
  • [Blazor] Handle cascading values coming from multiple sources #48451
    8.0-preview6
  • Introduce IRenderTreeBuilder to make blazor more flexible #48891
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 6.0.20 #48900
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Progressively enhanced navigation #48899
    area-blazor
  • Call HttpContext.Abort() when WebSocket.Abort() is called. #48892
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.9 #48901
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.8

Updated

  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • Retain DOM nodes during streaming SSR updates #48258
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    feature-output-caching, area-middleware
  • Reduce RendererSynchronizationContext overheads #48720
    area-blazor
  • Improve WebApplication debugging #48827
    area-runtime
  • Unhide server option in blazor web template #48838
    area-blazor
  • feat: Add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48662
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Draft: Add RedirectToActionOther method. #48823
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remote images not working in Image tag in latest version on Android #15735
  • A NullReferenceException is thrown on Android in the GridLayoutManager when calling InvalidateLayout #15729
  • iOS: svg images only bit color, any toolbar image doesn't resize #15728
  • .NET MAUI, how to load the iOS crash report to Visual Studio #15726
  • Android Platform App Theme does not automatically update when switching themes #15723

Closed

  • All texts are upside down if using .NET MAUI Blazor App with Windows 11 Arabic #15556
  • Graphics view on MacCatalyst #15563
  • Shell on Windows: Tabbar redraw problems #6929
    Backlog
  • TabBar / Tab colours not working correctly on Windows #12386
    .NET 8
  • AngularJS is not rendering in WebView on Android #11007
    Backlog
  • FilePicker on MacOS does not always return the file picked #11088
    Backlog
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Button ImageSource does not reset when setting to null. #15006
    Backlog
  • Maui much slower then Forms in debug-mode #15713

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance. #15734
  • [android] improve performance of Shell flyout opening #15733
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Refactor `IsRefreshing` property to separate animation and command execution responsibilities #15732
    community ✨
  • [net8.0] Use darc for packs from runtime #15731
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button issue updating background brush type #15725
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Tizen] Bump tizen preview6 #15724
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨

Merged

  • [Windows] Fix issues setting Shell TabBar appearance #15690
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Update CODEOWNERS #15008
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, partner/tizen
  • FilePicker on Mac Catalyst does not always return the file picked #13814
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Allow to remove the Image from Button #15624
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Updated

  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Optimize iOS selection synchronization #14613
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • Manual updates 20230615 Android ecosystem nugets bumped #15685
    area/platform

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Binary breaking changes in `NavigationEntry` in EF Core 8.0 #31104
  • Switch to storing enums as ints in JSON instead of strings #31100
  • No runtime error thrown when base class's navigator not mark as virtual when using lazyloading #31099

Closed

  • Test/Query: make sure that query test suites don't modify database (without transaction) #31029
  • New Analyzer to avoid StringComparison #31059

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31105
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.9 #31103
  • Update branding to 6.0.20 #31102

Updated

  • Support querying over non-primitive JSON collections #31095
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
    Servicing-approved, community-contribution, 7.0.9
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-approved
